mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Kemple, Henry C.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Kemple, Henry C. Patient Age: 22. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Fracture of ulna and radius. Fracture ulna and radius middle third on drill, accidentally . Location Wounded: Cumberland, MD. Date Wounded: 1865/05/02. Nature of Wound: Man [3 words illegible]. Result: Mustered out and discharged from service.
